name: Stripes Pocket Notebook
description:
This notebook features a zig-zag stripe pattern on the front and solid color on the back. There are currently two color schemes available; brown/teal/yellow stripes with solid teal back and violet/teal stripes with solid violet back. More colors coming soon!

My original linoleum block print design is hand carved and printed by me on an  unlined Moleskine pocket notebook with 64 pages and an inner pocket.

All of my products are hand printed and thus one of a kind. There may be slight inconsistencies in color and printing and possibly minor flaws, this is all part of the process and I do my best to produce only the highest quality products for my customers.

All images ©Samantha Blue 2012, please do not copy, reproduce or resell in any way.

name: Big City Pocket Notebook
description:
This print was inspired by my time living in New York City. I was in love with how the layers and layers of buildings look so uniform and so random at the same time. This notebook is currently available in two colors, Violet and Teal.

My original linoleum block print design is hand carved and printed by me on an  unlined Moleskine pocket notebook with 64 pages and an inner pocket.

All of my products are hand printed and thus one of a kind. There may be slight inconsistencies in color and printing and possibly minor flaws, this is all part of the process and I do my best to produce only the highest quality products for my customers.


All images ©Samantha Blue 2012, please do not copy, reproduce or resell in any way.

name: Not All Who Wander Pocket Notebook
description:
This little pocket notebook features one of my favorite quotes by one of my favorite authors, J.R.R. Tolkien:

“All that is gold does not glitter,
Not all who wander are lost;
The old that is strong does not wither,
Deep roots are not reached by the frost."


My original linoleum block print design is hand carved and printed by me on an  unlined Moleskine pocket notebook with 64 pages and an inner pocket.

All of my products are hand printed and thus one of a kind. There may be slight inconsistencies in color and printing and possibly minor flaws, this is all part of the process and I do my best to produce only the highest quality products for my customers.


All images ©Samantha Blue 2012, please do not copy, reproduce or resell in any way.

name: Miss Your Face Card
description:
The card says it all! We all have someone who's wonderful face we wish we could see every day. Why not tell them so?

These 5x7 inch cards come in three color schemes (teal and violet, teal and coral, or aqua and yellow) and were all designed and hand printed by me in my studio using high quality inks and paper. The envelopes included are made from recycled paper and much of the packaging and shipping material is also recycled/reused.


All images ©Samantha Blue 2012, please do not copy, reproduce or resell in any way.

name: Best Parts of Me Card
description:
"All of the very best parts of me came from you"

This card is perfect to show how important someone is to you, and can be used for any occasion (or just because they're special :)

These 5x7 inch cards come in your choice of three colors (Coral, Aqua and Violet) and were all designed and hand printed by me in my studio using high quality inks and paper. The envelopes included are made from recycled paper and much of the packaging and shipping material is also recycled/reused.


All images ©Samantha Blue 2012, please do not copy, reproduce or resell in any way.

name: Feel Better Soon Card
description:
Everyone needs a little cheering up when they're under the weather, and this get well card is just the thing. (Maybe along with some chicken soup?)

These 5x7 inch cards were all designed and hand printed by me in my studio using high quality inks and paper. The envelopes included are made from recycled paper and much of the packaging and shipping material is also recycled/reused.

All images ©Samantha Blue 2012, please do not copy, reproduce or resell in any way.

name: Happy Birthday Cupcakes Card
description:
Show that special someone just how special they are with these limited edition Happy Birthday Cards!

These 5x7 inch cards come in two color schemes (teal and violet or teal and coral) and were all designed and hand printed by me in my studio using high quality inks and paper. The envelopes included are made from recycled paper and much of the packaging and shipping material is also recycled/reused.


All images ©Samantha Blue 2012, please do not copy, reproduce or resell in any way.

name: Christmas Cards-Set of 4
description:
Tired of sending generic Christmas cards every year? Why not show your friends and family how special they are by sending them one of these limited edition cards.

This set of 4 (4x5 inch) Christmas cards were all designed and hand printed by me in my studio using high quality inks and paper. The envelopes included are made from recycled paper and as much of the packaging and shipping material is also recycled/reused.

************************************************************************
And to spread a little extra cheer this holiday season, if you spend over $35 I'll throw in a Samantha Blue pocket journal for you to keep or to use as a stocking stuffer :) Offer ends December 31st!
************************************************************************
